title: Home dashboard renders with core sections visible
description: Verifies the home dashboard loads and shows key navigation and summary widgets.

steps.description: Verify element "Your Lab" tab is visible

title: Open program detail from active program card
description: Verifies tapping the active program card opens the program detail screen.

steps.description: Verify element "Active program" card is visible
Verify element "Program detail" screen is visible

title: No active program state shows message and allows opening log hub
description: Verifies the empty state for no active program is shown and the Plus log hub can be opened.

steps.description: Verify text "No active program" is visible

title: Navigate to Programs view from Home via Programs tab
description: Verifies the Programs tab from the home dashboard opens the programs list view.

title: Navigate to Nutrition view from Home via Nutrition tab
description: Verifies the Nutrition tab from the home dashboard opens the nutrition view.

title: Navigate to Your Lab view from Home via Your Lab tab
description: Verifies the Your Lab tab from the home dashboard opens the exercise/food database view.

steps.description: Verify element "Your Lab" tab is visible
Verify element "Your Lab" view is visible

title: Plus button opens log hub from Home
description: Verifies the Plus button consistently opens the log hub from the home dashboard.

title: Home analytics and recovery indicators are visible on initial load
description: Verifies 1RM analytics and recovery indicators are present on the home dashboard.

steps.description: Verify element "1RM analytics" widget is visible

title: Open Programs list from the app entry
description: Verifies the user can navigate to the Programs list view and see the Programs screen content.

steps.description: Verify element "list of programs" is visible

title: Create a new program successfully and see it in the list
description: Verifies a user can create a program with a valid name, complete configuration steps, save, and see it appear in the Programs list.

steps.description: Type "E2E Program A" into the "Program name" field
Verify text "E2E Program A" is visible

title: Program name required validation on create
description: Verifies a validation error appears when attempting to save a new program without a name.

title: Cancel program creation without saving (no new program added)
description: Verifies exiting the create program flow without saving does not add a new program to the list.

steps.description: Type "E2E Program Unsaved" into the "Program name" field
Verify element "list of programs" is visible
Verify text "E2E Program Unsaved" is not visible

title: Prevent saving when only whitespace is entered as program name
description: Verifies the create program form rejects a name that is only spaces and shows the required-name error.

title: Open Program Detail from Programs list and view structure and sessions
description: Verifies a user can navigate to Programs, open a program detail page, and see the program structure and session list.

steps.description: Click on the "Programs" tab in the tab bar
Click on the first visible program card in the programs list

title: Switch between Weekly and Macrocycle views in Program Detail
description: Verifies the user can toggle between Weekly and Macrocycle views and the view content updates visibly.

steps.description: Click on the "Programs" tab in the tab bar
Click on the first visible program card in the programs list

title: Start workout from Program Detail when sessions exist
description: Verifies the Start workout action from Program Detail opens the workout session screen when sessions are defined.

steps.description: Click on the "Programs" tab in the tab bar
Click on the first visible program card in the programs list

title: Show error when Start workout is tapped with no sessions defined
description: Verifies the app shows the expected error message when attempting to start a workout from a program with no sessions.

steps.description: Click on the "Programs" tab in the tab bar
Click on a program card that indicates it has no sessions (if labeled) or an empty sessions state is visible after opening
Verify text "No sessions defined" is visible

title: Open a session from Program Detail to edit
description: Verifies a user can tap a session from the Program Detail sessions list and is taken to a session edit/details screen.

steps.description: Click on the "Programs" tab in the tab bar
Click on the first visible program card in the programs list
Click on the first visible session item in the sessions list

title: Use back button from Program Detail to return to Programs list
description: Verifies the in-app back control returns the user from Program Detail to the Programs list view.

steps.description: Click on the "Programs" tab in the tab bar
Click on the first visible program card in the programs list

title: Program Detail handles long session lists by allowing scrolling to Start workout
description: Verifies the user can scroll within Program Detail and still access the Start workout button when content is long.

steps.description: Click on the "Programs" tab in the tab bar
Click on a program card likely to have many sessions (if labeled), otherwise open any program

title: Create a new program via wizard and save
description: Verifies a user can create a new program through the wizard steps and save it, returning to the programs list with the new item visible.

title: Cancel program creation from wizard and confirm no new program is added
description: Verifies canceling the wizard creation returns to the programs list without saving a new program.

title: Wizard step navigation: configure blocks then proceed to mesocycles
description: Verifies the wizard supports progressing from the blocks configuration step to the mesocycles step.

title: Wizard step navigation: configure mesocycles then proceed to weeks
description: Verifies the wizard supports progressing from the mesocycles configuration step to the weeks step.

title: Wizard save is blocked when required fields are missing (validation visible)
description: Verifies attempting to save with incomplete required configuration shows a visible validation message and does not exit the editor.

title: Cancel from a later wizard step returns to programs list
description: Verifies cancel works not only at the start but also after progressing to later steps, returning to the programs list.

title: Save a newly created program appears in the list after returning
description: Verifies that after saving a new program, the programs list shows at least one program entry and the new entry is visible.

title: Edit a session end-to-end and save changes successfully
description: Verifies a user can open a program session, add an exercise, fully edit set details including RPE, optionally mark competition lift, and save to see updates reflected in program detail.

steps.description: Click on a program card in the programs list
Click on a session item to edit

title: Save should be blocked when set details are incomplete
description: Verifies validation prevents saving when an added exercise has incomplete set details and shows the expected validation message.

steps.description: Click on a program card in the programs list
Click on a session item to edit
Verify text "Complete set details" is visible

title: Remove an exercise from a session and save
description: Verifies an exercise can be removed from a session and the session can be saved with the removal reflected afterwards.

steps.description: Click on a program card in the programs list
Click on a session item to edit
Click on "Remove exercise" for an exercise in the session

title: Edit sets count for an exercise and save
description: Verifies the user can change the number of sets for an exercise and successfully save the session.

steps.description: Click on a program card in the programs list
Click on a session item to edit
Click on an exercise in the session to edit set details

title: Edit reps value for a set and save
description: Verifies the user can edit reps for a set within an exercise and save the updated session.

steps.description: Click on a program card in the programs list
Click on a session item to edit
Click on an exercise in the session to edit set details
Type "8" into the "Reps" field for the first set

title: Edit weight value for a set and save
description: Verifies the user can edit the weight for a set and save the session successfully.

steps.description: Click on a program card in the programs list
Click on a session item to edit
Click on an exercise in the session to edit set details
Type "100" into the "Weight" field for the first set

title: Edit RPE value for a set and save
description: Verifies the user can set or change the RPE value for a set and save the session successfully.

steps.description: Click on a program card in the programs list
Click on a session item to edit
Click on an exercise in the session to edit set details
Type "8" into the "RPE" field for the first set

title: Mark an exercise as a competition lift and save
description: Verifies the user can mark an exercise as a competition lift and save the session with the indicator shown in the editor.

steps.description: Click on a program card in the programs list
Click on a session item to edit
Click on the "Competition lift" toggle or checkbox for the added exercise

title: Start a workout session from a program and verify the workout session screen opens
description: Verifies a user can navigate from the Programs list into a program and start a workout session.

steps.description: Click on a program card in the programs list

title: Complete one set by entering weight and reps and verify the set is marked completed
description: Verifies set completion by entering weight and reps updates the visible set state in the live workout.

steps.description: Click on a program card in the programs list
Fill "100" into the "Weight" field for the first set
Fill "5" into the "Reps" field for the first set
Click on the "Complete" button for the first set

title: Use the rest timer between sets and verify timer UI appears and counts down/runs
description: Verifies the rest timer can be started during a workout and is visible while running.

steps.description: Click on a program card in the programs list

title: Pause and resume the rest timer during a workout
description: Verifies the rest timer supports pausing and resuming from the workout session UI.

steps.description: Click on a program card in the programs list

title: Use judging lights for a competition lift and verify a decision state is shown
description: Verifies judging lights can be tapped and a visible result/decision is displayed for competition lifts when available.

steps.description: Click on a program card in the programs list
Scroll to the judging lights section (if not visible)

title: Finish a workout and verify the workout summary is displayed
description: Verifies a user can finish a workout session and see a summary screen.

steps.description: Click on a program card in the programs list

title: Cancel a workout and confirm cancellation returns to program detail
description: Verifies a user can cancel a workout session and return to the program detail view.

steps.description: Click on a program card in the programs list

title: Cancel a workout and verify unsaved workout progress is not retained when starting again
description: Verifies that after canceling and confirming, restarting the workout does not show the previously entered (unsaved) set inputs as completed.

steps.description: Click on a program card in the programs list
Fill "80" into the "Weight" field for the first set

title: Log a meal from the food database and see the dashboard update
description: Verifies a user can log a meal by searching and selecting a food, entering a portion, saving, and seeing the nutrition dashboard reflect the new entry.

steps.description: Type "chicken" into the food search field
Click on a food item in the search results

title: After saving a meal, verify the nutrition dashboard shows the new meal entry
description: Verifies that saving a logged meal returns to the nutrition dashboard and displays the newly added meal in the visible list/summary.

steps.description: Type "rice" into the food search field
Click on a food item in the search results

title: Portion is required validation when saving a meal
description: Verifies that leaving the portion empty prevents saving and displays the validation error message.

steps.description: Type "banana" into the food search field
Click on a food item in the search results

title: Cancel out of meal logging without saving
description: Verifies the user can exit the meal logging flow without saving and returns to the nutrition dashboard.

title: Search food database with no matches shows an empty state
description: Verifies the food search handles an uncommon query and shows a visible no-results/empty state rather than incorrect results.

steps.description: Type "zzzznonexistentfood" into the food search field

title: Portion field rejects non-numeric input (or prevents save)
description: Verifies that entering a non-numeric portion does not allow a successful save and provides visible feedback.

steps.description: Type "milk" into the food search field
Click on a food item in the search results

title: View nutrition dashboard on opening the Nutrition tab
description: Verifies the Nutrition tab opens the nutrition dashboard view and key dashboard content is visible.

title: Open Your Lab and browse the exercise database list
description: Verifies the user can reach Your Lab from the app entry and see the exercise database list for browsing.

title: Open an exercise detail from the exercise database
description: Verifies the user can open an exercise detail view from the exercise database list.

steps.description: Click on the first exercise in the exercise list

title: Add a custom exercise and confirm it appears in the database
description: Verifies the user can create a custom exercise by filling required fields, saving it, and seeing it in the exercise database list.

steps.description: Type "E2E Custom Exercise A" into the "Exercise name" field
Verify text "E2E Custom Exercise A" is visible

title: Add a custom exercise from within an exercise detail view
description: Verifies the user can open an exercise detail and still initiate adding a custom exercise, then save successfully.

steps.description: Click on the first exercise in the exercise list
Type "E2E Custom Exercise B" into the "Exercise name" field
Verify text "E2E Custom Exercise B" is visible

title: Prevent saving a custom exercise with a duplicate name
description: Verifies saving a custom exercise with a duplicate name shows the expected duplicate-name error message.

steps.description: Type "E2E Duplicate Exercise" into the "Exercise name" field
Verify text "E2E Duplicate Exercise" is visible
Type "E2E Duplicate Exercise" into the "Exercise name" field
Verify text "Duplicate exercise name" is visible

title: Required field validation when saving a custom exercise with an empty name
description: Verifies the user cannot save a custom exercise without providing the required name field.

steps.description: Verify text "Exercise name is required" is visible

title: Cancel out of adding a custom exercise without creating it
description: Verifies the user can exit the add-custom-exercise form without saving and the new exercise does not appear in the list.

steps.description: Type "E2E Unsaved Exercise" into the "Exercise name" field
Verify text "E2E Unsaved Exercise" is not visible

title: Switch between Exercise and Food sections within Your Lab
description: Verifies the user can toggle between Exercise and Food views in Your Lab and see the correct section content.

title: Update preferences: change theme, toggle haptics and sound, and save
description: Verifies a user can change theme, toggle haptics and sound, save, and see the updated settings reflected in the UI.

title: Manage data: clear local data and confirm success message
description: Verifies a user can clear local data from Settings and sees the confirmation notification and return to the home dashboard.

title: Cancel clear local data from confirmation prompt
description: Verifies that canceling the clear-data confirmation does not clear data and keeps the user in Settings.

steps.description: Verify text "Data cleared" is not visible

title: Theme selection UI reflects the chosen theme after saving
description: Verifies that the selected theme option remains selected after saving preferences.

title: Haptics toggle state persists after saving and revisiting Settings
description: Verifies the haptics preference remains as set after saving and re-opening Settings within the session.

steps.description: Verify element "Haptics toggle (current state)" is visible

title: Sound toggle state persists after saving and revisiting Settings
description: Verifies the sound preference remains as set after saving and re-opening Settings within the session.

steps.description: Verify element "Sound toggle (current state)" is visible

title: Attempt to save without changing anything shows no error and stays in Settings
description: Verifies saving with no changes does not produce an error and keeps Settings usable.

title: Black screen and error detection smoke test
description: Verifies no black screens, no React ErrorBoundary, captures console/page errors, and navigates through main tabs (Home, Programs, Nutrition, Wiki/Lab) to ensure app loads correctly.

steps.description: Verify main element is visible (no black screen)
Verify main has visible content (not empty)
Verify ErrorBoundary (Error en) is NOT visible
Verify tab bar or navigation is visible
Navigate to each tab (Inicio, Programas, Nutricin, Wiki) and verify content loads
Verify no critical JavaScript errors (ReferenceError, Cannot access)
